RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 1 1/16M Turf CR: 88. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since June 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since February 28, 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 1/16 Miles) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUINN MURPHY was well off of the pace, raced last, saved ground on the rail, was allowed to find her stride, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, circled the field through the turn, kept closing and gaining ground while racing six wide in the stretch, finally got passed the field after the sixteenth pole, cleared the leader after that, got up in time for the win. FROSTY FLIRT was well off the pace, raced in the two path, shifted out and advanced at the half mile pole, continued t gain ground, shifted into the four path and circled the field through the turn, was six wide in the upper stretch, closed well, cleared the rest of field by the sixteenth pole, took command, but was quickly collared by another closer and just missed settling for second. LIL ASHLEY B. was off a bit slow, raced off of the pace in the four path, started gaining ground and building momentum at the half mile pole, edged out and circled the field through the turn in the five path, and responded to encouragement closing well in the stretch. HISSY MISSY raced on the rail in the middle of the field, improved position and was in a stalking position after the half, advanced and moved between foes near the quarter pole, then had no racing room and gave way. CARPE HORSESHOE stalked the pace from the four path, was on the outside of the second tier, maintained position while running even. FLOWERSFORSHANTELL stalked the pace from the three path, raced in between foes in the turn, but never got involved. GANGSTER RAP vied for the lead, was racing in the three path, showed the way, set the pace, had company through out, tired. CALAJA vied for the lead, raced two wide, set the pace while leading then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Frosty Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 2w, advanced 1/2, shifted into 4th, circled turn, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Quinn Murphy
ENTRY.OWNER: Day Perry and Foster Joseph M
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, saved ground, one run, bid3/8, circled, clearedup

ENTRY.NAME: Hissy Missy
ENTRY.OWNER: F S F LLC A New Beginning
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail, mid pack, improved, btwn 3/8, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Ashley B.
ENTRY.OWNER: Duffy's Racing Stable LLC and Heider Racing Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, 4w, launched bid1/2, circled, 5w, closed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 29, 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GLENN'S JUMPER used his natural speed and was on the lead, angled down into the two path, had control of the race even though there was another contender on the led with him at first, shook that foe and set the pace to his liking, was cued at the five sixteenth pole and immediately had the lead by a length, then drew off willingly in the stretch winning in wire to wire fashion. OJITOS vied for the lead, raced on the rail to the inside of another rival, briefly led as a set, settled off of the outside co leader, settled into a stalking position, then faded on the rail, then in the last sixteenth of a mile came b ack and got up for second. BAYOU BEAUX stalked the front runners, raced three wide, maintained position through out while running even. J. E.'S HANDMEDOWN was off a tough slow, raced from off of the pace, raced in the five path then shifted into the six path through the turn and into the upper stretch closed down the lane willingly. PLATINUM EQUITY was off in mid pack, raced four wide, gained ground, shifted into the five path and circled the field through the turn, was in contention but had no late kick. HOMEVIEW raced in he four path while he stalked the pace, raced in between rivals, settled in hands and matched strides with another rival but was no menace. HULEN was off a bit slow, raced off of the pace and three wide, raced towards the inside and saved ground through out while still making no impact. SONIC CITY trailed through out. ANALYZER stalked the pace from the rail, was in contention early then had no finished.

ENTRY.NAME: Hulen
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, 3w, saved ground, clean inside trip

ENTRY.NAME: Ojitos
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, rail, briefly led, took back, stalked, faded came back

ENTRY.NAME: Homeview
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w, stalked, raced between foes, matched strides, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Equity
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, shifted 5w, circled, to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Beaux
ENTRY.OWNER: Gillis, Betty J. and Joseph A.

ENTRY.NAME: Glenn's Jumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed, 2w-3w, led, pace, bid 5/16th, drew off for the win

ENTRY.NAME: J. E.'s Handmedown
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, off pace, 5w, 6wupper, closed willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Wood David and Dunn John Michael

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLASHY BOY GOES vied for the lead in the seven path, settled off of the lead and stalked the front runner, challenged for the lead at the half mile pole, took control of the race, led, drifted out a bit in the stretch but held sway. STELLAR TAP was off slow, raced six wide, shifted into the four path and circled the field through the turn, found best stride late even through she struggled to switch leads, and was up for second. J'S LITTLE MAN was off a bit slow, was last and raced un hurried, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, saved ground and raced on the rail, stayed on her left lead but still closed well in the stretch and was able to get for third. MAJOR CONTENDER vied for the lead, raced on the rail. showed the way while attending the pace, then flattened out. CLERIC stalked the pace from the four path, raced in between foes, shifted into six path in the upper stretch and struggled to switch leads as he closed down the stretch. G'S STORM stalked the pace, raced on the rail, was in between foes, drifted in in the stretch. SOUTH AL SPARKY raced four wide but made no real impact. CRAFTY HEAT flashed brief speed. CHIEFWEAVE stalked, quickly faded.

ENTRY.NAME: G's Storm
ENTRY.OWNER: Gustafson, Dawn M. and Darwin L.

ENTRY.NAME: Major Contender
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, stalked, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Cleric
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, shifted 6 wide, upper, left lead, even

ENTRY.NAME: J's Little Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, last, unhurried, bid 3/8, rail, closed well, left lead

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy Goes
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, 7w, stalked, challenged 1/2, led, drifted out stretch, held

ENTRY.NAME: Stellar Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, 6w, shifted into 4pth, circled, stayed in left lead, 2n

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LETSTAKEITOUTSIDE raced off of the pace early on, was five wide and starting gaining ground ,launched a bid at the at the half mile pole, shifted out and circled the field through the turn, took control at the4 five sixteenth pole, and drew off easily. BROOK IS GOLDEN vied for the lead, raced on the rail, was in command and setting the factions, was collared by another contender at he five sixteenth poie, chased into the stretch but was second best today. INSPECTOR ED was off t a slow start, raced from off of the pace in the two path, maintained that position through out while running an even race. LIT A SHUCK stalked the leader from the three path but did not have enough today. ALL OF US stalked from the four path but was never really involved. LOWER CRETACEOUS showed little. LIFEASWEKNOWIT flashed brief speed, then went wrong. LIFEASWEKNOWIT WAS EASED AND WALKED ACROSS THE WIRE AND WALKED OFF.

ENTRY.NAME: Brook Is Golden
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, rail, led, collared, chased, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Lifeasweknowit
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L

ENTRY.NAME: Letstakeitoutside
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5w, bid1/2, circled, led 5-16th, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards) (Rail at 20 f eet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOD'S GOLD stalked the front runner from the three path, was on the bit and pulled to the front, briefly co-led, then was asked to rate, finally settled a bit then launched a bid at the three eighths pole, challenged for the lead at the quarter pole, battled through the stretch drive, up in itme. MR LEO AND JOSE vied for the lead, took control, raced two wide, set the pace, was challenged by another rival at the quarter pole, hooked this foe and battled down the lane, but just missed late. OWEN THE ICE MAN was off mid pack, smartly raced on the rail, saved ground through out, advanced in the turn, was in striking distance at the quarter, responded to well to heavy encouragement and passed rivals while racing on the rail getting up for third. RONALDS GATSBY raced in the middle of the field from the three path, maintained that position through out then put in a mild bid late. MODOC raced mid pack from the four path, quickly moved into a stalking position, continued to gain ground on the outside, was within striking distance and faded. THINKINGNDRINKING was reluctant to load, was off slow, raced on the rail, saved ground, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, but did not have enough. TAPIT TWICE was off a tough slow, raced four wide, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, had no late kick. CLEARLY A JET was off to a slow start, raced in the three path and had no impact. LINCOLN PRODUCTION stalked the pace from the three path was shuffled back, shifted into the five path in the upper stretch. SWEET PRESENT showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Ronalds Gatsby
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, maintained position through out, mild bid late

ENTRY.NAME: Thinkingndrinking
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant, off slow, rail, bid3/8, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Modoc
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, stalked, gained outside, within, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Owen the Ice Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, strong encouragement, up for third

ENTRY.NAME: God's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, strong, 4w, bid3/8, challenged 1/4, battled, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OCEAN FLEET stalked, the pace setter, raced in between foes, matched strides through the turn and battled down the lane, was able to out finish her rival getting up for the win. BAILEY'S CHARM raced four wide in the second tier of horses, moved upon the outside after the half mile pole, took the lead buy the five sixteenth pole, battled down the stretch but hung late settling for second. BISTINEAU BELLE raced mid pack and put in late run getting up for third. CALCITE stalked the pace, maintained position while racing even. OUR LIL SCANDAL was never involved. JIVIN ASTRO made no impact. SAVANNAH BANANA trailed, but made a mild bid late. TAKEOVER TIME was no menace. JAZZ JAZZ JAZZ flashed early speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, btwn, matched, battled, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Bailey's Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w, 2nd tier, moved outside 1/2, led 5-16th, battled, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Jivin Astro
ENTRY.OWNER: Jarrett Jr Terrell and Lara Racing Stables LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 29, 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,5 00.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOCTOR LEO raced mid pack, closed down the stretch and was able to get up in time. FIERY PLAYBOY stalked the pace, was cleared by an outside foe, chased down the lane, was no match for the winner but was second best today. LILRASCALMAN off slow put in a mild bid late. SLITHER raced off of the pace and maintained position through out. BIBLEMAN vied for the lead, set the pace, tired. TARGET PRACTICE showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Leo
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, closed stretch, up in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 8 7 1/2F Turf CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 27000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For A Claiming Price Of Less Than $25,000). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the t urf course, it will be run on the main track at one mile and seventy yards) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMART IZZY raced off of the pace, improved position and closed down the lane getting up in time. WARRIOR'S RETURN stalked the leader and closed, chasing after the winner, getting up for second. MARMO MOON stalked the leader while running an even race. SHEZA SHINING STAR stalked the pace, then could not sustain the bid and tired. MARK WITH AN E mid pack, mild bid. CHARLIZE trailed, best stride late. LITTLE Z flashed speed. RON'S LAVENDER reluctant to load. MISS SINGH ANGEL showed little. YOCKEY BETTERFLY bolted. YOCKEY BETTERFLY BOLTED AND JUMPED THE RAIL, SHE WAS ABLT TO WALK ONTO THE VAN THEN WAS VANNED OFF. THERE WAS A STEWARTS INQUIREY. AFTER A STEWARTS REVIEW IT WAS DETERMINED THAT YOCKEY BETTEERFLY BOLTED AND WENT OVER THE RAIL.

ENTRY.NAME: Yockey Betterfly
ENTRY.OWNER: Whitley Ranch and Racing LLC and Whitley Ray

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Shining Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Bradley Thoroughbreds Laura Leigh Stable Cone Jim Belmar Racing and Breeding LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Marmo Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked the leader and raced even
